Actions.Name: Add note to incident
Actions.Description: Add note to a given incident.

Actions.Name: Create incident
Actions.Description: Creates a new incident for a given service identifiable by the integration key.

Actions.Name: Escalate incident
Actions.Description: Use a given escalation policy on an incident.

Actions.Name: Get incident
Actions.Description: Retrieves incident object by incident key.

Actions.Name: Get user by ID
Actions.Description: Retrieves the user's information for a given ID.

Actions.Name: When an incident is acknowledged
Actions.Description: Triggers when an existing incident is acknowledged.

Actions.Name: When an incident is assigned to a user
Actions.Description: Triggers when an incident is assigned to the given user.

Actions.Name: When an incident is resolved
Actions.Description: Triggers when an existing incident is resolved.

Actions.Name: When an incident is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new incident is created.

Actions.Name: When a note is added
Actions.Description: Triggers when a note is added to the given incident.

Actions.Name: Resolve incident
Actions.Description: Mark a given incident as resolved.

Actions.Name: Snooze incident
Actions.Description: Snooze a given incident by a certain time.
